How to determine the midpoint of two points

\begin{array}{c}\n1 \\\n(-2,1)= \\\n\frac{0}{0} \\\n\frac{1}{5} \\\n\frac{1}{10} \\\n\frac{1}{2}\n\end{array}[imath]1 [/imath] [imath](-2,1)= [/imath] [imath]\frac{0}{0} [/imath] [imath]\frac{1}{5} [/imath] [imath]\frac{1}{10} [/imath] [imath]\frac{1}{2}[/imath]
